# init(thresholds:)

**Initializer**

Creates N-1 bins with the given N `thresholds`.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated init(thresholds: [Value])
```

## Parameters

- **thresholds**: The threshold values that surround the bins.

## Return Value

The bins.
title: init(thresholds:)
